tool.name: PanPhLan
tool.help:
PanPhlAn is a strain-level metagenomic profiling tool for identifying the gene composition of individual strains in metagenomic samples. PanPhlAnâ€™s ability for strain-tracking and functional analysis of unknown pathogens makes it an efficient tool for culture-free microbial population studies.
**Inputs** ==========
===============
You can download sample data to your computer from the following locations and then upload it to Galaxy using the Get-Data / Upload file from your computer.
**Make sure to select Type csv**
* Sample_Metadata_
* Sample_Taxonomy_
